text: Paul Barry (born 1952) is a British-born, Australian-based journalist. Paul Barry may also refer to: * Paul Barry (American football) (1926–2014), American running back * Paul Barry (songwriter) (active from 1998), British songwriter and musician * Paul W. Barry (active 1948-1957), American polo player ==See also== * Barry Paul (born 1948), British Olympic fencer * Paul Barry-Walsh (born 1955), British businessman * Paul Berry (disambiguation)
title: Paul Barry (disambiguation)
